game.title: Search for the Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact
game.description: You have been hired by a renowned historian to retrieve an ancient artifact rumored to be hidden in the uncharted wild lands.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the historian's gratitude

task.description: Make your journey to the wild lands, be prepared to face unknown threats.
Search the rumored location for the artifact. Be on the alert, as many have failed this journey before.
Return the artifact to the historian safe and unscathed.
